javadoc:
Thread responsible for getting interactive lines of python from the plugin.
 This class also kicks off the execution of that line in a new {@link PythonPluginExecutionThread}.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a new python input thread that gets a line of python input from the given plugin.
@param plugin The python plugin to get input from.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new python input thread that gets a line of python input from the given plugin.

params.name: plugin
params.comment: The python plugin to get input from.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the last python plugin execution thread that ran.
@return The last python plugin execution thread that ran.  Could be null if one never ran.
methods.name: getPythonPluginExecutionThread
methods.comment: Gets the last python plugin execution thread that ran.

return.comment: The last python plugin execution thread that ran.  Could be null if one never ran.

methods.javadoc: Disposes of the thread by telling it to not continue asking for input.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Disposes of the thread by telling it to not continue asking for input.

name: PythonPluginInputThread
comment:
Thread responsible for getting interactive lines of python from the plugin.
 This class also kicks off the execution of that line in a new PythonPluginExecutionThread.
